sentence.Network_en: Josh expects me to manage all the household expenses on very little.
sentence.Network_cn: 乔希指望我对每笔家庭支出都精打细算。

sentence.Network_en: I wouldn't be that hard on him, Josh.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不能那样苛责他, 乔希.

sentence.Network_en: Come on, Josh, you don't expect me to buy what you said just now.
sentence.Network_cn: 行啦, 乔希, 你别指望我会相信你刚才说的话.
